DataObject.Name: BomItems
DataObject.Description: Items that are on the Bill Of Material

DataAttribute.Name: Id
DataAttribute.Description: (AutoIdentity) Unique identification of the BOM item

DataAttribute.Name: OrderId
DataAttribute.Description: (FK to Orders) The order this BOM item is related to

DataAttribute.Name: MaterialId
DataAttribute.Description: (FK to Materials) The material of this BOM item

DataAttribute.Name: Quantity
DataAttribute.Description: The quantity needed of this BOM item

DataAttribute.Name: UOM
DataAttribute.Description: Unit Of Measurement of this BOM item

DataObject.Name: MaterialGroups
DataObject.Description: All groups of material needed for production. Both raw as finished good material groups are defined in this table

DataAttribute.Name: Id
DataAttribute.Description: (AutoIdentity) Unique identification of the material group

DataAttribute.Name: Code
DataAttribute.Description: Unique key of this material group

DataAttribute.Name: Description
DataAttribute.Description: Description of this material group

DataAttribute.Name: Id
DataAttribute.Description: (AutoIdentity) Unique identification of the material parameter

DataAttribute.Name: Code
DataAttribute.Description: Unique key of this material parameter

DataAttribute.Name: MaterialGroupId
DataAttribute.Description: (FK to MaterialGroups) MaterialParameters are material group specific. The material group this material parameter belongs to

DataObject.Name: MaterialParameterValues
DataObject.Description: The value of the material specific parameters

DataAttribute.Name: Id
DataAttribute.Description: (AutoIdentity) Unique identification of the material parameter value

DataAttribute.Name: MaterialId
DataAttribute.Description: (FK to Materials) The material this parameter value belongs to

DataAttribute.Name: MaterialParameterId
DataAttribute.Description: (FK to MaterialParameters) The material parameter of this material parameter value

DataAttribute.Name: Value
DataAttribute.Description: The actual value of this material specific parameter

DataObject.Name: Materials
DataObject.Description: The raw and finished goods materials for the production

DataAttribute.Name: Id
DataAttribute.Description: (AutoIdentity) Unique identification of the material

DataAttribute.Name: MaterialGroupId
DataAttribute.Description: (FK to MaterialGroups) The material group this material belongs to

DataAttribute.Name: Code
DataAttribute.Description: Unique key of this material

DataAttribute.Name: Description
DataAttribute.Description: Description of this material

DataObject.Name: OrderMessages
DataObject.Description: Logging of all messages that have been received for orders from an external system

DataAttribute.Name: Id
DataAttribute.Description: (AutoIdentity) Unique identification of the order message

DataAttribute.Name: Code
DataAttribute.Description: Unique key of this order message

DataAttribute.Name: SentDate
DataAttribute.Description: Date and time the order message has been sent to MES

DataAttribute.Name: ReceivedDate
DataAttribute.Description: Date and time the order message has been inserted into the MES system

DataAttribute.Name: Id
DataAttribute.Description: (AutoIdentity) Unique identification of the order

DataAttribute.Name: OrderMessageId
DataAttribute.Description: (FK to Orders) The order message (Header) of this order

DataAttribute.Name: Code
DataAttribute.Description: Unique process order code key of this order

DataAttribute.Name: MaterialId
DataAttribute.Description: (FK to Materials) The finished goods material of this order

DataAttribute.Name: ResourceId
DataAttribute.Description: (FK to Resources) The resource this order must be produced on

DataAttribute.Name: TargetQuantity
DataAttribute.Description: The desired quantity to produce for this order

DataAttribute.Name: UOM
DataAttribute.Description: The Unit Of Measurement belonging to the target quantity of this order

DataAttribute.Name: PlannedStartDate
DataAttribute.Description: The desired date and time to start production of this order

DataAttribute.Name: StartDate
DataAttribute.Description: The actual date and time the production of this order started

DataAttribute.Name: FinishDate
DataAttribute.Description: The actual date and time the production of this order ended

DataObject.Name: Resources
DataObject.Description: The resources that are present in the plant for needed for production

DataAttribute.Name: Id
DataAttribute.Description: (AutoIdentity) Unique identification of the resource

DataAttribute.Name: Code
DataAttribute.Description: Unique key of this resource

DataAttribute.Name: Description
DataAttribute.Description: Description of this resource

DataAttribute.Name: TraceLevel
DataAttribute.Description: System.Diagnostics.SourceLevels excluding ActivityTracing and All

DataAttribute.Name: Type
DataAttribute.Description: 0=GeneralSetting, 1=User, 2=Group, 3=Computer

        placeHolders += ",";
        parameters += ",";
    }
}

Template.Text:
<%
    // Define the name the outputcode should be written to
    //outputFile.PathName += (@"\DataAccess\" + dataObject.Schema );
    outputFile.PathName += (@"\Actemium.EmptyClient.DataAccess\Gennie" );
    outputFile.FileName = dataObject.Name + ".Gennie.cs";

    bool readOnly = false;
    if ((project["readOnly"] == "1") || (project["readOnly"].ToLower() == "true"))
       readOnly = true;

  	//String schemaNamespace = dataObject.Schema != "dbo" ? dataObject.Schema + "." : "";
  	String schemaNamespace = "";

	DataAttribute identityCol = null; 
	
	String AddParameters = "";
	foreach ( DataAttribute attribute in dataObject)
	{
	    if (AddParameters != "")
	        AddParameters += @",\r\n";
  	    if (attribute.IdentityColumn)
  	    {
		    identityCol = attribute;
		    AddParameters += string.Format("\t\t\t\t\t{0}Param", attribute.Name);
		}
		else
		{
		    AddParameters += string.Format("\t\t\t\t\thelper.CreateInputParam(\"@{0}\", new{1}.{2}", 
					GennieHelper.RemoveHungarianPrefix(attribute.Name), GennieHelper.Singularity(dataObject.Name), GennieHelper.PascalCase( attribute.Name, true,true));
	        if(attribute.NullAllowed)
	        {
	            if (attribute.Type != DataAttribute.DotNetTypeEnum.String)
	            {
	                AddParameters += string.Format(".HasValue ? (object)new{0}.{1} : DBNull.Value", 
	                    GennieHelper.Singularity(dataObject.Name), GennieHelper.PascalCase( attribute.Name, true,true));
	            } 
	            else 
	            {
	                AddParameters += string.Format(" != null ? (object)new{0}.{1} : DBNull.Value",
	                    GennieHelper.Singularity(dataObject.Name), GennieHelper.PascalCase( attribute.Name, true,true));
	            }
	        }
	        AddParameters += ")";
		}
    }
    AddParameters += ");";


    String AddReturnType = "";
    String identityVar = "";
    string returnLine = "";
    if (identityCol == null) 
    {
        AddReturnType = "void";
        returnLine = "return;";
    }
    else
    {
        AddReturnType = identityCol.Type.ToString();
        identityVar = String.Format("\t\t\t\tDbParameter {0}Param = helper.CreateOutputParam(\"@{1}\", DbType.{2});",
                        identityCol.Name, GennieHelper.RemoveHungarianPrefix( identityCol.Name), identityCol.Type);
        returnLine = string.Format("\t\t\t\treturn ({0}){1}Param.Value;", identityCol.Type, identityCol.Name);
    }

    // generation variable declarations

 AttributeCollection primaryKeys = dataObject.GetAll(DataAttributeField.PrimaryKey);

 string placeHolders = "";
 string parameters = "";

for(int i=0; i<primaryKeys.Count; i++)
{
    DataAttribute attribute = primaryKeys[i];
    placeHolders += "{" + i.ToString() + "}";
    parameters += GennieHelper.CamelCase(attribute.Name, true, true);
    if (i < primaryKeys.Count-1)
    {
        placeHolders += ",";
        parameters += ",";
    }
}

        var helper = Database.GetDbHelper();
        StringBuilder sqlStatement =  new StringBuilder("UPDATE [<%=dataObject.Schema%>].[<%=dataObject.Name%>] SET ");
        List<DbParameter> parameterList = new List<DbParameter>();
        for (int i = 0; i < propValues.Length ; i++)
        { 
          sqlStatement.AppendFormat( "[{0}]=@{0}", propValues[i].Key);
          if (i< propValues.Length -1)
            sqlStatement.Append( ", ");

        }
        sqlStatement.Append(" WHERE ");
        <%

              int recordsAffected = helper.ExecuteText(sqlStatement.ToString(),

        if (recordsAffected == 0)

<%
    // Define the name the outputcode should be written to
    //outputFile.PathName += (@"\Database\" + dataObject.Schema );
    outputFile.PathName += (@"\Database" );
    outputFile.FileName = dataObject.Name + ".Gennie.sql";

	AttributeCollection primaryKeys = dataObject.GetAll( DataAttributeField.PrimaryKey);


// INSERT part
	String InsertParams = "";
	String InsertFields = "";
	String InsertValues = "";
	String InsertIdentity = "";

	foreach(DataAttribute attribute in dataObject)
	{
		if (InsertFields != "")
		{
			InsertFields += @",\r\n";
			InsertValues += @",\r\n";
		}
		if (InsertParams != "")
			InsertParams += @",\r\n";

		InsertParams += string.Format("\t\t@{0} {1}", GennieHelper.RemoveHungarianPrefix( attribute.Name).PadRight(32), attribute.DataBaseType);
		if (attribute.DataBaseType.IndexOf("char") >= 0)
		    InsertParams += string.Format( "({0})", attribute.TypeLength);
		if (attribute.DataBaseType.IndexOf("decimal") >= 0)
				InsertParams += string.Format( "({0})", attribute.TypeLength);

		if (attribute.IdentityColumn)
			InsertParams += " OUTPUT";

		if (!attribute.IdentityColumn)
		{
			InsertFields += string.Format("\t\t[{0}]", attribute.Name);
			InsertValues += string.Format("\t\t@{0}", GennieHelper.RemoveHungarianPrefix(attribute.Name));
		}
		else
		{
			InsertIdentity = string.Format("\tSELECT @{0}= SCOPE_IDENTITY();", attribute.Name);
		}
	}


// DELETE part
	string DeleteParams = "";
	string DeleteWhere = "";
	foreach(DataAttribute attribute in dataObject)
	{
		if (attribute.PrimaryKey)
		{
			if (DeleteParams != "")
				DeleteParams += @",\r\n";
			DeleteParams += string.Format("\t\t@{0} {1}", attribute.Name.PadRight(32), attribute.DataBaseType);

			if (attribute.DataBaseType.IndexOf("char") >= 0)
			    DeleteParams += string.Format( "({0})", attribute.TypeLength);
			if (attribute.DataBaseType.IndexOf("decimal") >= 0)
					DeleteParams += string.Format( "({0})", attribute.TypeLength);

			if (DeleteWhere != "")
				DeleteWhere += @" AND \r\n";
			DeleteWhere += String.Format("\t\t[{0}] = @{1}", attribute.Name, GennieHelper.RemoveHungarianPrefix( attribute.Name));
		}
	}

// MODIFY part
	string ModifyParams = "";
	string ModifyFields = "";
	string ModifyWhere = "";
	
	foreach(DataAttribute attribute in dataObject)
	{
		if (ModifyParams != "")
			ModifyParams += @",\r\n";	
				
		ModifyParams += string.Format("\t\t@{0} {1}", GennieHelper.RemoveHungarianPrefix(attribute.Name).PadRight(32), attribute.DataBaseType);

		if (attribute.DataBaseType.IndexOf("char") >= 0)
			ModifyParams += string.Format( "({0})", attribute.TypeLength);
		if (attribute.DataBaseType.IndexOf("decimal") >= 0)
			ModifyParams += string.Format( "({0})", attribute.TypeLength);

		if (attribute.PrimaryKey)
		{
		if (ModifyWhere  != "")
			ModifyWhere  += @" AND \r\n";
			ModifyWhere += string.Format( "\t\t[{0}].[{1}] = @{2}", dataObject.Name, attribute.Name, GennieHelper.RemoveHungarianPrefix(attribute.Name));

		}
		else if (!attribute.IdentityColumn)
		{
			if (ModifyFields != "")
				ModifyFields += @", \r\n";
			ModifyFields += string.Format( "\t\t[{0}].[{1}] = @{2}", dataObject.Name, attribute.Name, GennieHelper.RemoveHungarianPrefix(attribute.Name));

		}
	}


// GETBYID part
	string GetByIdParams = "";
	string GetByIdWhere = "";
	foreach(DataAttribute attribute in dataObject.GetAll( DataAttributeField.PrimaryKey))
	{
		if (GetByIdParams  != "")
			GetByIdParams  += @",\r\n";
		if (GetByIdWhere  != "")
			GetByIdWhere  += @" AND \r\n";
		GetByIdParams += string.Format( "\t\t@{0} {1}", GennieHelper.RemoveHungarianPrefix( attribute.Name).PadRight(32), attribute.DataBaseType);

		if (attribute.DataBaseType.IndexOf("char") >= 0)
			GetByIdParams += string.Format( "({0})", attribute.TypeLength);
		if (attribute.DataBaseType.IndexOf("decimal") >= 0)
			GetByIdParams += string.Format( "({0})", attribute.TypeLength);

		GetByIdWhere += string.Format( "\t\t[{0}].[{1}] = @{2}",
			dataObject.Name, attribute.Name, GennieHelper.RemoveHungarianPrefix( attribute.Name));
	}
%>
